MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD11 and TD13 postcode areas of Duns and Cockburnspath. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.53am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still investigating the fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.43am on Tuesday 5th January 2021
